title: Hollywood’s Box Office Rebound?
description: Hollywood’s box office rebound may be gaining steam. Bloomberg Intelligence sees 2026 ticket sales rising to $9.2 billion, while media consolidation could reshape the industry. The Boxoffice Company SVP Daniel Loria joined Bloomberg TV with his movie outlook for 2026. (Source: Bloomberg)
